responses.title: King am I of all the wraiths.
It's Wraith King, not Rage King! Arrgh...
Comes now the King of Wraiths!
You've never known war unless you've warred with a Wraith!
I'LL HELP MY WEAK AND PUNY ALLIES WHERE I CAN. (3% chance)
Your king moves of his own accord.
Who dares look upon the wraith?
Submit to the Wraith King's rule!
Tis the third reign of the Wraith King!

name: Using Reincarnation Without Any Nearby Allies

responses.title: I don't like where this is going.
Soon perhaps I'll choose a queen.
Now, this is truly the game of kings.
I'm your once and future thing.
Ah ha ha ha ha ha!
Another subject for the Wraith King!
You come to a bad end.
I merely release the wraith within!
Your flesh falls, your spirit bows to me.
Prostrate yourself! Oh good, you did.
Very well, I accept your surrender.
I'll take that as a compliment.
Was that some sort of misguided tribute?
Don't question it. Just let it roll over you.
Nipped that coup in the bud.
Ah ha ha ha ha ha ha hah!
Lord have mercy? I think not.
Oh ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
Eh ha ha ha ha ha!
Oh ha ha ha ha ha ha!
Eh ha ha ha ha ha!
Mm hm hm ha ha ha ha!
Oh ho ho ho ho ha ha!
Ah ha ha ha ha ha!
Ah ha ha ha ha ha!
What sort of king was that?
Oh Queen of Pain, I still can't feel your touch.
I would that you had joined me as my queen.
Undying, they called you. That's a laugh. Aha ha!
You'll make a better subject than anything in your book.
You dared raise a hand, or whatever that is, against your king?
Your spirits have abandoned you to join my wraiths.
Your shades guided you to my kingdom.
From ashes reborn. I know the feeling.
Sorry, Doom, I was a great admirer of your work.
Underlord. Your title is worthless here.
Go back and guard your arcs.
And you call yourself a lord.
Lord of what land were you again?
Was that some sort of lord?
Funny, I don't remember knighting that one.
You should know better than to oppose a king.
Even titans must bend the knee.
Court mage? More like court jester.
Your spirit was too lowly to stand before a king.
No amount of foresight could have prepared you.
You were a poor pretender to my throne.
You are here out of season, Winter Wyvern.
I could not tolerate such an explosive presence in my kingdom.
Come and whisper your prophecies beside my throne.
Let us align our kingdoms, oh Sandy One.
I regret that as a wraith I can no longer feel pain.
Lifestealer, if you ever feel like serving a different master, let me know.
What brings you to these wraithly woods, Windranger?
I welcome the Spirit of Earth, though I'll not be buried in it.
Ah, Phoenix, one who knows what it's like to fall and rise again.
Will you dedicate your blade to my service, oh Terrifying One?
Oracle, you must have foreseen that your future lies with me.
Ah, I've been looking for you. I hereby assign you Lordship of the Abyss!
I dub thee Chaos Knight! How's that for a name? Not bad, eh?
I'll make wraiths of you all.
Did I give you permission to fall?
How comes a wraith to die?
Dig my grave and I'll put you in it.
I should have chosen a queen!
Who will lead my kingdom now?
So this is how it ends?
The age of kings has ended.
Good thing I'm already a wraith!
That was my last raw nerve!
What sort of king am I?
I'll be right back. Wait? What?

name: Using Reincarnation or Aegis of the Immortal

responses.title: Death has no grip on me.
Ah ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
Uh ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
You can't kill a king who's dead!
Your once and future king is crowned!
Now it's someone else's turn to die.
Ah ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
Flesh and bone. Both are a hindrance.
My subjects will be glad to hear my voice.
I have dreamed of this day.
What is a kingdom without a king? Just dom.
I'll not be so easily dispatched.
Issue a proclamation. The Wraith King's throne is occupied.
The kingdom's gone to hell while I was away.
My kingdom is in every way improved beyond whatever it was before.
Purer than flesh, stronger than bone, imperishable is the essence of the wraith.
I scarce recall the kingdom of my first coronation. The wraith flame has consumed those memories.
The ossuaries of the first regime have all been clothed in flesh.
The first kingdom seems like a fever dream now--a place of clattering bone white trees and towers.
Where once was bone, wraith flesh as far as the eye can see.
I'd empty every treasury for this. Even my own.
What's a king without his scepter?
Blink Dagger! Heh heh. Surprise, your King is here! Heh. Oh, this will be glorious. (3% chance)
I NOW HAVE ALL THE SEXY. (1% chance)
It's the three Rs--Refresher, Rapier, and Wraith! (10% chance when having Refresher Orb)
Oh, Rapier. NOW YOUR KING IS BALLING OUT OF CONTROL! (5% chance when having Refresher Orb)
In the name of the king.
Ah ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
Ah ha ha ha ha ha ha!
Has any king ever had a shorter reign?
Welcome to all my new subjects. Now let's get to know each other.
As if I needed more of this. But I'll take it. (25% chance)
Haste in everything but judgment. (25% chance)
Crown me twice, shame on you! (25% chance)
Even a wraith must seek renewal. (25% chance)
We'll lead as three kings! (25% chance)

name: Attempting to Use an Ability on Cooldown
Attempting to Use an Ability without Mana

responses.title: You have done the kingdom a service.
First Blood! I've still got it!
It is only right that First Blood should go to your king!
It's as certain as my choice of heir, this one is in the bag.
I believe I have a storeroom full of these.
You can buy a lot of allies with one of these.
This will be a jewel in my already sparkling crown.
Mm hm hm ha ha ha ha!
Oh ho ho ho ho ha ha!
Ah ha ha ha ha ha!
Ah ha ha ha ha ha!
Would it not please you to cut me down?
Come at me, I beg you.
Do your worst, I'll not resist.
You'll have no trouble beating me down, dog.
Do us a favor and put me out of my misery.
